availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Mary M. Spalding Carrico in Washington County on November 5, 1830. Father of Martha Carrico, Rose Carrico, Harriet Carrico, Susan Carrico, James Carrico, Catharine Carrico, Joseph Carrico, Maranda Carrico, Sarilla Carrico, Nathan Carrico, Frank Carrico. Married to Mary Ann Boarman in Marion County on November 3, 1864. Farmer in Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 435.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film #000551244, p. 256.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #000597424, p. 167.
Find A Grave, "Pious Carico (c1810-1894)," Memorial #75264080, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75264080 (accessed February 7, 2019).
